participant_1.background:
I built a detailed model of the Eiffel Tower last year.
twilight is my favorite book series.
I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right.
I work as a park ranger, which allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.
I'd love to learn more about my family history and where I come from.

participant_2.background:
I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con.
I remember my father coming home at night after a long shift and telling me stories about his day.
My favorite websites are those that help me learn about curly hair care and maintenance.
I've never been arrested, but I would love to travel the world and play music like my brother.
i am bisexual.

content.text: I just got back from Comic Con. It was so much fun!
That sounds awesome! I've never been to Comic Con, but I've always wanted to go.
It's really fun! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! What was your favorite part?
I loved dressing up and exploring my nerdy side. I also really enjoyed meeting all the other fans of my favorite shows and movies.
That sounds amazing! I love dressing up too. I'm a big fan of Twilight.
I've never read Twilight, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely check it out! It's a really good series.
I will! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby.
I've heard good things about that book too. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good read.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
